headline: Aptiv PLC (NYSE:APTV): Better Roads Ahead
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Aptiv PLC (NYSE:APTV) on ValueInvestorsClub by ElCid. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on APTV. The company’s shares were trading at $62.73 when this thesis was published, vs. the closing price of $66.83 on Mar 07. APTV designs, manufactures, and sells vehicle components in North […]
